name: Dear Kanéko
description:
The game explores the adventure of Kanéko, a girl who wants to be a mechanic in a world where cogs and tools are replacing magic. She doesn't have any magical powers but she wants to prove that she is worth anyway by becoming one of the greatest mechanic of her time. In order to do so, she has to find tools, unlock chests and doors that are spread over three levels. 

The game is based on exploring the environment and solve small, easy puzzles. This game experience was produced as a project for the Game Design course of the University of Edinburgh. 

Music by YumeMike: https://www.yumemike.com/
